explanation: [0-0] In an empty room, there is only a table with a vase of flowers on it.

[0-10] A dark yellow cartoon monkey hops into the frame from the right side of the screen, holding a toy rocket. The monkey laughs happily and waves the toy rocket in its hand, accidentally hitting the vase on the table. The vase teeters precariously and is about to fall. The monkey closes its eyes in fear, and the background color gradually deepens to red. The vase falls to the ground and shatters. The monkey sits on the ground in fear, mouth agape, looking surprised.
